name: temp-wasm-force-pkg
description: Temporary package for WebAssembly implementation of force directed graph

scripts.build: emcc --bind -o dist/d3-force-wasm.js src/cpp/force_xy.cpp src/cpp/force_many_body.cpp -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s USE_ES6_IMPORT_META=1 -s ENVIRONMENT='web,worker,node' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -O3
scripts.build:debug: emcc --bind -o dist/d3-force-wasm-debug.js src/cpp/force_xy.cpp src/cpp/force_many_body.cpp -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s USE_ES6_IMPORT_META=1 -s ENVIRONMENT='web,worker,node' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -O0 -g4

author: matoototo
